ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: The earlier and the later peoples will certainly all be gathered
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "Indeed, the earlier and the later generations
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Tell them, (O Prophet): “The earlier ones and the later ones
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), say, "All the ancient and later generations
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim, “Without doubt all – the former and the latter.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "(Yes) verily, those of old, and those of later times."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: The first and the last,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'The ancients, and the later folk
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say (unto them, O Muhammad): Lo! those of old and those of later time
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "Indeed, the earlier ones and the later ones
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: verily the ancients and those of later generations:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Indeed the former and latter generations
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "Yea, those of old and those of later times,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "(Yes) verily, those of old, and those of later times.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'Those of ancient times and those of later times
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, the former and the later peoples
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:49] Say: ‘Truly the former and the later [generations]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) Muhammad, to the people of Mecca: (Lo! those of old and those of later time
